product_name: REI Fleet Skapris - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Fun and sporty, the women's plus-size REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capris) combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of your favorite workout capris. Polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries fast, so you stay comfortable no matter the temperature. Built-in capris feature mesh panels behind knees to boost ventilation. Mesh panel along back yoke also increases ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Elastic waistband with drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Zippered lumbar pocket stashes valuables. Skirt features a 14.5 in. outseam. The REI Fleet skirt with capris features an active fit that offers a full range of motion.
short_description: Fun and sporty, the women's plus-size REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capris) combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of your favorite workout capris.
